hero.title: A Magical Bedtime Adventure!
hero.description: Meet Earl: the happiest monster in the entire universe. Earl is so happy because he wears the most snuggly, stretchy, fluffy, fuzzy, cuddly, cozy socks ever!

features.title: Fabulous Sock Trees
features.description: Visit Earl in the faraway forest where he plucks fresh socks off the sock trees

features.title: Sparkle Fizz Secrets
features.description: Learn how Earl cleans his socks with Sparkle Fizz and keeps them smelling like Giddie Lofus roses

features.title: Stocking Storage
features.description: Discover where Earl keeps his stacks and stacks of stocking twins in magical sardine tins
